comment: His lectures are long and boring, but this particular class was super easy. He is an easy grader and is super caring. If you have a problem or a question, he will gladly answer it for you. Highly recommend him
If you need to knock out an elective take this guy. Lectures are entertaining and class is set up for you to succeed. 4 online tests completely open and an online final that is op

Dr. Fallon is a great professor. He really wants his students to succeed. He will answer any question you have. He is a very easy grader & will also give bonus questions after tests to boost up your score. Homework, quiz, and test are very easy. He have a great sense of humor! Amazing guy!

There are 10 assignments, 3-4 tests, and a final. You can have some cheat sheets for the tests and final. The assignments are easy, just follow the instructions. The material is very interesting. Just study and do your stuff and you will be fine. Plus he will help out if needed so don't hestitate

He has tons of knowledge and he is willing to help you succeed the class. There are 4 tests (one test is dropped), 10 labs and a final. We can use cheat sheets on the final and tests. Some labs you have to write a report and some are check offs.

He is a great professor. He explains the content well and if you don't understand it, he will make it easy for you to understand. He is helpful in lab. The only thing that can be considered tough is the tests and final so be sure to fully understand the concepts.

Great Professor, knows his material and is very helpful in labs. If you approach him with the basic knowledge in lab he'll basically give you the answers. His test are SUPER easy. Recommend taking him for any class that he teaches.

Great professor who is very knowledgeable in aerodynamics. Tests are pretty tough so prepare to study. Very helpful as he has regular homework sessions and goes over test questions to ensure understanding. Kind of a stickler when it comes to certain rules. However, wish he was able to teach more classes in aerospace at KSU.
I took him for Aerodynamics.  It's a tough class, but super interesting. He grades VERY tough on tests, and they are quite difficult - but if you like aviation like I do,

Professor Fallon is really enthusiastic about the material, and gives engaging lectures. I took him for the summer semester, so the work was kind of crammed, but he was quite lenient on due dates as a result. He really wants his students to do well and it shows. Definitely take his class if you can.

Dr. Fallon is one of those rare professors that sincerely cares about your success.  He goes above and beyond.  He is helpful, respectful, and highly intelligent.  He communicates well.  If a mold could be cast of the perfect professor, you would be hard pressed to find someone that could compete with him for the spot.  Take him.

How has this guy not been rated in over a year?? He is an excellent professor. Patient, understanding, and enthusiastic. Took Circuit Analysis I with him during the summer and even though it was a cram he coordinated with the class to help avoid over-working ourselves while still learning. 100% recommend Tom he's a swell guy and teacher.
He is a great professor !!

great and knowledgeable professor. will provide help in his off time.  You will definitely need to practice and study java.  Don't bother to buy the book, We never used it.I received a B in the class.

This dude ROCKS!!!  Very interesting class as he prepares you for the world of Elec.Eng.  I switched majors the next semest but had NOTHING to do with him.  That Claudio Estevez was moreso the reason.  So Tom was a pleasure to have as a professor and there havent been many of those 4 me at SPSU since.
Very very nice and easy professor.  Gives you more help than you need.  Explains complex concepts very clearly making them easy to understand.

Prof. Fallon is a good man who is secure in his own skin. If you have to take a class that he teaches, take his. He is a great teacher and treats everyone as equals and with respect. No favorites. If you are quiet, he involves you. In my mind, Dr. Tom Fallon is the definition of the word Professor.

Great teacher, class was a little more math-based than what I was expecting.  Explains things and what he expects very clear.  Wants students to do well, and will work with you.  Very interesting class, worth taking
Is very nice and willing to help you better understand anything with pleasure. He is an overall great person.
very respectful

Awesome Teacher. Gives practices tests before the tests if you ask him too. And its almost the exact same thing on test. Also, lets you use cheat sheet on every test. I recommend him for everyone. Labs are easy, and he is always there to help if you need it.
Probably one the best Professor's I have had. Very respectful and encouraging. Willing to share information and help where possible.
Very easy class.  He lets you do the labs outside of class.
